articles.author: Jenni Reid, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: Europe stocks lower; banks slide 4.8% as Credit Suisse and UBS fall on takeover deal - CNBC
articles.description: European markets fluctuated amid a banking sell-off as investors take stock of the Credit Suisse deal.
articles.content:
European stock markets fluctuated through Monday morning as investors digested news of UBS's takeover of Credit Suisse.
The pan-European Stoxx 600 index was initially lower before moving into positi… [+1103 chars]
